Package org.daisy.factory

Provides factory classes for coexisting implementations of a certain type.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FactoryCatalog<T extends FactoryObject> Provides an interface for factory catalogs.
FactoryFilter<T extends FactoryObject> Provides an interface for filtering a collection of FactoryObjects.
FactoryObject Provides an interface for common properties of a FactoryObject.
Provider<T extends FactoryObject> Provides an interface for a collection of FactoryObjects.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFactoryObject Provides an abstract class for FactoryObjects.
 

Package org.daisy.factory Description

Provides factory classes for coexisting implementations of a certain type. The main purpose is to allow a user to choose a factory at runtime, based on each factory's name and description.
